articles.title: Marina Bay Sands gets a shout-out from BTS' Jimin for the group's virtual art tour collab with Google - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The K-pop band member picked Singapore as the location for his virtual gallery as part of the BTS x Street Galleries project. New York, Sao Paulo, London, Los Angeles and Seoul were also chosen by his bandmates.
